name: react-mainloop
description: A React Component that uses a game loop to animate another component.

scripts.build: rimraf dist && babel src --out-dir dist --optional es7.objectRestSpread --optional runtime
scripts.jest: echo "Error: no tests specified sadface" && exit 1
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run jest
scripts.prepublish: npm test && npm run build && npm shrinkwrap

author: Thom Wright <npm@thomwright.co.uk> (http://thomwright.co.uk/)
